mapper.select: SELECT A.ATD_NO, A.EMP_NO, A.EMP_NAME, E.DEPT_NO, A.ATD_DATE, A.ATD_LEAVE, A.ATD_TYPE, A.ATD_STATUS, A.ATD_REMARKS, '' || C_STATUS.CMN_DETAIL_NAME || '' AS statusLink, '' || C_TYPE.CMN_DETAIL_NAME || '' AS typeLink FROM ATTENDS A JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL C_STATUS ON A.ATD_STATUS = C_STATUS.CMN_DETAIL_CODE JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL C_TYPE ON A.ATD_TYPE = C_TYPE.CMN_DETAIL_CODE ORDER BY A.ATD_NO DESC
